snippet: LEAD: Marty Denkin, a state boxing official, said yesterday that Sugar Ray Leonard, who was not allowed to spar on Tuesday because he did not hold a boxing license in California, had been told previously that he could not engage an opponent in the...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Marty Denkin, a state boxing official, said yesterday that Sugar Ray Leonard, who was not allowed to spar on Tuesday because he did not hold a boxing license in California, had been told previously that he could not engage an opponent in the ring. Leonard arrived on the West Coast Tuesday for a public workout to promote his Nov.
